content: Our paper "Refining Contrastive Learning and Homography Relations for Multi-Modal Recommendation" is accepted by ACM MM 2025.
Our paper "Causal Cascading Convolution Networks for Multi-behavior Sequential Recommendation" is accepted by Information Sciences.

Our paper "Balancing Information Perception with Yin-Yang: Agent-Based Adaptive Information Neutrality Model for Recommendation Systems" is accepted by the 33rd ACM International Conference on Multimedia ().
Our paper "Causal Cascading Convolution Networks for Multi-behavior Sequential Recommendation" is accepted by Information Sciences.
I am honored to join the Editorial board of Information Processing & Management.
We will organize a special issue at Electronics. Submissions are welcome!

Our paper "Balancing Information Perception with Yin-Yang: Agent-Based Adaptive Information Neutrality Model for Recommendation Systems" is accepted by IEEE Transactions on Computational Social Systems (TCSS).
Our paper "DyBooster: Leveraging Large Language Model as Booster for Dynamic Recommendation" is accepted by Expert Systems with Applications (ESWA).
We will organize 2025 Principle and practice of data and Knowledge Acquisition Workshop (PKAW) at PRICAI 2025. Submissions are welcome!
Our paper "Model-agnostic Dual-side Online Fairness Learning for Dynamic Recommendation" is accepted by IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering (TKDE).
I will join the Faculty of Data Science at City University of Macau, as an Assistant Professor, from 26 December 2024.
Our paper "A Novel Complex Network Prediction Method Based on Multi-Granularity Contrastive Learning" is accepted by CCF Transactions on Pervasive Computing and Interaction (TPCI).
Four papers are accepted by BESC 2024. One of them is awarded the best paper award.
Our paper "TCGC: Temporal Collaboration-Aware Graph Co-Evolution Learning for Dynamic Recommendation" is accepted by ACM Transactions on Information Systems (TOIS).
We will organize 2024 Principle and practice of data and Knowledge Acquisition Workshop (PKAW) at PRICAI 2024. Submissions are welcome!
Our paper "Enhancing Spatiotemporal Prediction with Intra- and Inter-granularity Contrastive Learning" is accepted by DASFAA 2024.
Our paper "Nudging Towards Responsible Recommendations: A Graph-Based Approach to Mitigate Belief Filter Bubbles" is accepted by IEEE Transactions on Artificial Intelligence.
Our paper "DOR: A Novel Dual-Observation-Based Approach for Recommendation Systems" is accepted by Applied Intelligence.
Two papers are accepted by ICDM 2023.
Our paper "BeECD: Belief-aware Echo Chamber Detection over Twitter Stream" is accepted by PRICAI 2023.
Our paper "Dynamic Graph Evolution Learning for Recommendation" is accepted by SIGIR 2023.
I will be the Workshop Chair of PKAW 2023. Submissions are welcome!
I am invited to be a Web Chair of ICA 2023.
I am invited to be a PC Member of PRICAI 2023.
I am invited to be a PC Member of BESC 2023.
Our paper "ABEM: An Adaptive Agent-based Evolutionary Approach for Influence Maximization in Dynamic Social Networks" is accepted by Applied Soft Computing.
Our paper "Identifying Influential Users in Unknown Social Networks for Adaptive Incentive Allocation Under Budget Restriction" is accepted by Information Sciences.
Our paper "Game Theory Based Compatible Incentive Mechanism Design for Non-Cryptocurrency Blockchain Systems" is accepted by Journal of Industrial Information Integration.
I am invited to give a keynote speech at IEEE ICA 2022. The speech title is Influence-aware Incentive Allocation Problem under Uncertainty.
Our paper "GAC: A Deep Reinforcement Learning Model Toward User Incentivization in Unknown Social Networks" is accepted by Knowledge-Based Systems.
I am invited to be a PC Member of PRICAI 2022.
I am invited to be the Publicity Chair of PKAW 2022, which will be held with PRICAI 2022. Submissions are welcome!
Our paper "AI Facilitated Isolations? The Impact of Recommendation-based Influence Diffusion in Human Society" is accepted by IJCAI-ECAI 2022.
I am invited to be the Webmaster of PRICAI 2022. Submissions are welcome!
Our paper "OMT: An Operate-based Approach for Modelling Multi-topic Influence Diffusion in Online Social Networks" is accepted by WISE 2021.
Our paper "An Operator-based Approach for Modeling Influence Diffusion in Complex Social Networks" is accepted by Journal of Social Computing.
Our paper "Learning Policies for Effective Incentive Allocation in Unknown Social Networks" is accepted by AAMAS 2021.
I am invited to be the Webmaster of PKAW 2020, which will be held with IJCAI-PRICAI 2020. Submissions are welcome!
Our papers "Adaptive Incentive Allocation for Influence-aware Proactive Recommendation" and "Incentivizing Long-term Engagement Under Limited Budget" are accepted by PRICAI 2019.
